title: The Supreme Innocent:: The Colour of the Cloth
description: Are you a seeker searching for purpose in your life?Are you broken, looking for love?Are you tired of yourself, wishing you could find a reset option for your life?Do you think of yourself as a Christian; but, aren't really sure what that means?Are you intimate with God and looking for a way to help others understand why?If you answered, "Yes!" to any of the above questions this allegorical book just might help you to find what you are searching for."THE SUPREME INNOCENT" is a book for the lost. It is a rough and tumble book that shows rather than tells how a person can become the worst version of themselves - and how they can still be helped, loved, valued, and renewed.This book is an allegory written for people who have been "Put through the mill in life," chopped up, spat out and stepped on. It is based on a true story and that story was written for you.
author: L.A. Mansell Sway Taylor
